segments.text: Honey , do you know what color the carrot is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , my son is so clever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not a child at all . I know more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my son looks like a grown-up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Mom , I can take care of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No kidding . So tell me what's your favorite color ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like blue . You see , that's the color of the sky . I wanna be a superman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope I can fly to any place like superman . So I can touch the sky .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , superman . Put on your cape , we are going to fly home .
segments.speaker: S1
